forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 58F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening. Fog developing late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 45F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
